s3transfer - An Amazon S3 Transfer Manager for Python
*****************************************************

S3transfer is a Python library for managing Amazon S3 transfers.

Note:

  This project is not currently GA. If you are planning to use this
  code in production, make sure to lock to a minor version as
  interfaces may break from minor version to minor version. For a
  basic, stable interface of s3transfer, try the interfaces exposed in
  boto3
